title: Combine Recap - DL & LB + Chase Young & Prospect Interviews
itunes:title: Combine Recap - DL & LB + Chase Young & Prospect Interviews
description:
Bucky Brooks and Lance Zierlein are back with a special new episode from the 2020 NFL Scouting Combine. To start off, the guys recap what they saw from the defensive linemen at the combine, which includes edge rushers (0:45). After that, Bucky talks with South Carolina defensive tackle Javon Kinlaw about the adversity he's faced in his life (11:12). Next, Bucky interviews Penn State edge rusher Yetur Gross-Matos as he describes his experience at the combine (16:55). After that, Bucky talks with Ohio State edge rusher Chase Young about how playing at Ohio State has helped him (21:58). To wrap up the show, the guys discuss which linebackers stood out (27:29).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
